name: Titanium.UI.Windows.CommandBar
summary: A Windows application bar located at the bottom of the window.

deprecated.notes: As of Titanium 9.0.0, building Windows apps is no longer supported.

properties.name: items
properties.summary: Items to display in the command bar.
properties.description:
Add Titanium.UI.Windows.AppBarButton and Titanium.UI.Windows.AppBarToggleButton objects as well as separators created with the createAppBarSeparator method.

On Windows Phone applications, up to four items may be added. If more than four items are added, only the first four items will appear.
